title: Possible Sona bug
body: I'm not sure if this is a general issue, but each game whenever I use any of Sona's abilities for the first time everyone freezes for about a second. It seems like it's something to do with loading the appropriate assets for the first time, but I'm not really sure.

replies.body: This is a known issue that will be fixed soon! Thanks for the report! :D

> This is a known issue that will be fixed soon! Thanks for the report! :D

You're right, it's been a know issue for a bit! I don't know what the deal is with the graphical bugs you're describing, since that's not directly related to skins, and the content I'm familiar with. 

We don't have one team dedicated to bug fixing. Each discipline is responsible for bugs pertaining to their content. For example, skins team only fixes skins-related bugs.  When we're not fixing bugs, we're working on new content, which takes up a good portion of the time!
